title: Citrus Cos Salad
ingredients: ['1 lime - zested, peeled and sliced', '2 mandarin oranges - peeled and sectioned', '1 orange - zested, peeled and sectioned', '1 grapefruit - peeled and sectioned', '1 shallot, diced', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 head romaine or cos lettuce, torn']
